before.name: growthexperiments_link_recommendations
before.comment: Recommended wikilinks to add to articles. Cache table for results from an external recommendation service which is too slow to use directly.

columns.name: gelr_page
columns.comment: The page the recommendations are for. Foreign key to page.page_id.

columns.name: gelr_revision
columns.comment: The revision the recommendations are for. Foreign key to revision.rev_id.

columns.name: gelr_data
columns.comment: Link recommendation data as an arbitrary JSON object.

columns.name: gelr_page
columns.comment: The page the recommendations are for. Foreign key to page.page_id.

columns.name: gelr_revision
columns.comment: The revision the recommendations are for. Foreign key to revision.rev_id.

columns.name: gelr_data
columns.comment: Link recommendation data as an arbitrary JSON object.
